text: Hi, <@U05EFM7SQDB> this looks very ineresting to me. I filled out the form. Let me know if we can talk soon! Cheers, Amitabh

Hey all - 3-time SaaS founder here! I have an SDR I've been working with for more than a year and trained him from the ground up.

Currently, we're going a bit slower on sales due to pivoting and looking to share this SDR on a part-time basis.

Anyone interested? Shoot me a DM and we can chat more!
